content.question: A researcher is crossing two organisms that are heterozygous for three Mendelian, unlinked traits (<math alttext="uppercase X lowercase x, uppercase Y lowercase y, uppercase Z lowercase z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>XxYyZz</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>). Which of the following is the fraction of offspring that are predicted to have the genotype <math alttext="lowercase x lowercase x, lowercase y lowercase y, lowercase z lowercase z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>xxyyzz</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 5.A: Perform mathematical calculations, including: i. mathematical equations in the curriculum ii. means iii. rates iv. ratios v. percentages and percent changes
